__e: Polly. Let me begin with an apology.
Please, Polly, I cannot lose you again.
Polly, I just thought you should know.
- Because, Nightmare Smurfette, by all rights, it should've been Polly and Jason on that stage being crowned.
Like when Polly and Pete told us, I felt panicked for them before I remembered that people actually want to get pregnant now.
You two talk to Polly, you come with me.
